item.title: By: ms7398msake
item.dc:creator: ms7398msake
item.description: I think having a studio that focuses entirely on remakes and remasters is a good thing because in my opinion there are a lot of games from the 5th and 6th generation of consoles that have great ideas and concepts and could really use a fresh coat of paint as well as some improvements to their controls to bring them to modern standards.

item.title: By: chester_abellera
item.dc:creator: chester_abellera
item.description:

Not that dogsh*t Ubisoft is working on.
